name: Nusprite
author: nuweb

sections.description:
Nusprite plugin allows you to generate sprite images from featured images of posts and get CSS rules with PHP.

Features

  • Choice in image source (feature image or custom field)
  • Versioning system for long term file caching

nusprite.pot file available
sections.installation:
1. Upload the full directory into your ‘/wp-content/plugins’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin at the plugin administration page

You will find ‘Nusprite’ menu in your WordPress admin panel
sections.faq:
Nusprite Needs Your Support

It is hard to continue development and support for this free plugin without contributions from users like you. If you enjoy using Nusprite and find it useful, please consider making a donation. Your donation will help encourage and support the plugin’s continued development and better user support.

Can I change the plugin code?

Yes. Thank you for submitting your changes to update the plugin.

Image credits don’t show

Make sure you specified a post_meta (see settings).
sections.changelog:
0.2

  • preview background color is used in post list
  • use feature image custom fields

0.1

  • First version

short_description: Sprite image generator. PHP methods are available in order to get positioning of each element and write CSS rules.
